name: unworked
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If an area of land is unworked, it has not been used for growing crops, or valuable substances have not been removed from it: There are still some unworked areas of ground in the valley. The gold mines have been left unworked since the start of the twentieth century.
If a substance or material is unworked, it has not been used, shaped, etc.: There were two huge pieces of unworked marble on the floor of the workshop.
More examplesFewer examplesMuch of the less valuable ore was left unworked.The ruins lay unworked until a team from Denmark began an excavation of the site ten years ago.
